ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Photoelectric absorption with variable abundances. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A photoelectric absorption with variable abundances using Balucinska-Church and McCammon (ApJ 400, 699) cross-sections set by the set_xsxsect command. The column for each element is in units of the column in a solar abundance column of an equivalent hydrogen column density of 10^22 cm^-2. The Solar abundance table used is set by the set_xsabund command. This model is identical to xsvphabs except for the way that the parameters are defined.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: equivalent columns for H, He, C, N, O, Ne, Na, Mg, Al, Si, S, Cl, Ar, Ca, Cr, Fe, Co, Ni

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
